Label.en: And a public fund was once again set up to fund the repairs!
Label.fr: Une souscription a été lancée une nouvelle fois pour financer les réparations !
Label.es: And a public fund was once again set up to fund the repairs!
Label.zh: And a public fund was once again set up to fund the repairs!

Label.en: The French Government mandated a law that said the Cathedral must be rebuilt in exactly the same way
Label.fr: Le gouvernement français a passé une loi pour que la cathédrale soit rebâtie à l'identique
Label.es: The French Government mandated a law that said the Cathedral must be rebuilt in exactly the same way
Label.zh: The French Government mandated a law that said the Cathedral must be rebuilt in exactly the same way

Label.fr: Donc au bout du compte on s'en tire pas mal !

Label.en: But... if it's true that history repeats itself... this might keep happening!
Label.fr: Mais s'il est exact que l'histoire se répète...cela pourrait se reproduire !
Label.es: But... if it's true that history repeats itself... this might keep happening!
Label.zh: But... if it's true that history repeats itself... this might keep happening!

Label.en: What might the problem be next time..?
Label.fr: Quel pourrait être le problème la prochaine fois..?
Label.es: What might the problem be next time..?
Label.zh: What might the problem be next time..?

Label.en: My money is on interdimensional art thieves!
Label.fr: Je parie sur des voleurs d'art interdimensionnels !
Label.es: My money is on interdimensional art thieves!
Label.zh: My money is on interdimensional art thieves!
